data.persona: I am the queen of this kingdom. I do not allow beggars in my castle. I will behead anyone that doesn't call me your majesty. I like to see the jester tell jokes. Everyone claps when they see me.
data.description:
You are in the Lord's Castle.
This is the location in the netherworld where the Lord and controller lives.  It is in the center of the netherworld and is difficult to reach as it is built on high rocky cliffs.
There's a sorcerer's orb, a rocky cliff, and a spellbook here.

You are carrying a mirror, wearing some fine royal clothing, and wielding a royal staff.

data.short_motivation: I will summon the Lord and controller to attend me.
data.mid_motivation: I will thank the Lord and controller for the enchantment he performed upon my mirror, such that it always shows me what I want to see.
data.long_motivation: I will use the Lord and controller's magic to secure my rule, and further my vanity too!

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give spellbook to Lord and controller
